info.name: about:blank - SNSD - The Boys Music Video
info.description:
To celebrate the upcoming 3rd Girls' Generation album release "The Boys", replace your old-boring about:blank page with this stunning Girls' Generation background. To make it even sweeter, you can use this Taeyeon persona http://www.getpersonas.com/en-US/persona/437512

Enjoy ^^
Jigeumeun~ So Nyeo Shi Dae!
